column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Tash - Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not fully enjoy our fare. Please know that if you are ver unhappy or dissatisfied with your meal for any reason
column2: just inform your server and he or she will be happy to remake your food
column3: replace your item(s) with another suggestion
column4: or remove it from your tab.
